page.title: 12CHADDESLEY PARENTS ASSOC.
page.content: Chaddesley Corbett Endowed First School has a flourishing Parents Association which was formed in 1978. At first the association saw its roll as an additional "fighting force" if fears of school closure became a reality. The ensuing years have seen this roll change to a more passive and supportive one. They have held many fund raising events in the village, ranging from a stall at the village fete to coffee evenings at members homes. They have organised cricket and football matches, barn dances and discos, skittles, jewellery parties and many raffles. The money raised was used to pay for visits to Pantomimes, theatres and Nature and Wild Life centres. They have purchased, a computer,sports equipment, books, cassette players, cassettes, and a clock for the school.
